Quick note on this...

 

Hypermedia controls are part of hypermedia docum=
ent. That's things linking to things.

 

If you pre-define statically all =
the URIs for your state transitions, you *do not have* hypermedia controls.=
 You have static endpoinds a la SOAP. And that's because you don't have hyp=
ermedia documents.

 

*if* you delegated some of those endpoints definitio=
ns to some discovery mechanism a la UDDI, then maybe you've managed to rein=
troduce the hypermedia documents, but then you've gone full circle in reinv=
enting the wheel.
